Publisher: Liggett & Myers Tobacco Company (American, North Carolina)
Credit Line: The Jefferson R. Burdick Collection, Gift of Jefferson R. Burdick
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The United States and Canada, 1900 A.D.–present
Description: Trade cards from the "Baseball Teams" series (T200), published in a set of 16 cards in 1913 by Liggett & Myers Tobacco Company to promote their Fatima Turkish Blend Cigarettes brand.
